info.author: University of California at San Francisco
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
info.description:
μManager is an Open Source software package for imaging and control of automated
microscopes on multiple platforms (Windows, Mac and Linux). Together with
ImageJ, a popular image processing package, μManager provides a comprehensive
imaging solution – comparable to commercially available ones.

A python wrapper is provided that allows complete access to the
Micro-Manager core hardware control system. A large number of motorized
microscopes, cameras, stages, and accessories can be easily controlled from
python scripts or the python command line.

See
https://valelab.ucsf.edu/~nico/MMwiki/index.php/Using_the_Micro-Manager_python_library
for instructions on using python with Micro-Manager.

info.name: Micro-Manager
info.html_description:
μManager is an Open Source software package for imaging and control of automated microscopes on multiple platforms (Windows, Mac and Linux). Together with ImageJ, a popular image processing package, μManager provides a comprehensive imaging solution – comparable to commercially available ones.

A python wrapper is provided that allows complete access to the Micro-Manager core hardware control system. A large number of motorized microscopes, cameras, stages, and accessories can be easily controlled from python scripts or the python command line.

See https://valelab.ucsf.edu/~nico/MMwiki/index.php/Using_the_Micro-Manager_python_library for instructions on using python with Micro-Manager.
